Articles.Content:
So I just ran into issues with a joystick (It's only some joysticks however) and the calibrations for it being off because it's taking in rawdata due to how Squad uses the Unity engine. Here's a link to a workaround. That workaround however requires the user to disable device administrators. This however is potentially harmful for the computer and annoying due to a little watermark on the desktop.

If this was to be fixed by squad I will be forever in their debt.
